title: Can we recite Laylatul Qadr dua at other times? #assimalhakeem #assim assim al hakeem
transcript: I wanted to ask you um if we read uh Dua on everyday basis is it permissible or does it come in B it is totally permissible to ask for forgiveness and this Dua is not only restricted to it's a generic Dua specifically on it's one of the best but if you decide to say this Dua in suud or every moment of your day while walking or talking or sitting down there is nothing wrong in that inshallah
